name: Cv
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages.
This automatic page generator is the easiest way to create beautiful pages for all of your projects. Author your page content here [using GitHub Flavored Markdown](https://guides.github.com/features/mastering-markdown/), select a template crafted by a designer, and publish. After your page is generated, you can check out the new `gh-pages` branch locally. If you’re using GitHub Desktop, simply sync your repository and you’ll see the new branch.

### Designer Templates
We’ve crafted some handsome templates for you to use. Go ahead and click 'Continue to layouts' to browse through them. You can easily go back to edit your page before publishing. After publishing your page, you can revisit the page generator and switch to another theme. Your Page content will be preserved.

### Creating pages manually
If you prefer to not use the automatic generator, push a branch named `gh-pages` to your repository to create a page manually. In addition to supporting regular HTML content, GitHub Pages support Jekyll, a simple, blog aware static site generator. Jekyll makes it easy to create site-wide headers and footers without having to copy them across every page. It also offers intelligent blog support and other advanced templating features.

### Authors and Contributors
You can @mention a GitHub username to generate a link to their profile. The resulting `<a>` element will link to the contributor’s GitHub Profile. For example: In 2007, Chris Wanstrath (@defunkt), PJ Hyett (@pjhyett), and Tom Preston-Werner (@mojombo) founded GitHub.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and we’ll help you sort it out.

### Dzmitry Kasenka
Software Engineer
4 year of experience 
Vitebsk, Belarus | dzmitry.kasenka@openmailbox.org| LinkedIn

### Summary

Full stack development  – technologies and programming languages  that able to create both parts of software:  backend and frontend.

Full development lifecycle – from concept through delivery of next-generation applications and customizable solutions.
Good in development methodologies, tools and processes contributing to the design and deployment of cutting-edge software applications.
Have the troubleshooting skills – able to analyze code and engineer well-researched responsive solutions.


### Technical Tools

Symfony2,  Angular JS, C#, PHP, JavaScript, Go,  MSSQL, MySQL, REST, SOAP, SOFEA, SOA Visual Studio .Net, PHPStorm, PHP Unit,  jQuery, Gulp, Grunt, IIS, EC2, Digital Ocean, Azure

	
### Professional Experience

## Software Engineer, 1/14 to Present – Freelance
Design and development solutions for automatic electronic documentation systems. Design and development services for low consumption of resources.

Achievement Highlights:
Completed several solutions that used electronic sign systems API like DocuSign and EchoSign . 
Improved services performance and reduced cost of servers by providing fronted oriented architecture and optimizations of server side  
Good experience in rapid application development and management of technological issues for assigned projects.


## Software Engineer, 6/13 to 1/14 – Intelex Group, Vitebsk
Full stack development some services: aggregator of optical news, automobiles board, integration new design in library store, media service with public REST API.

Achievement Highlights:
Completed 7 projects.
Improved skills in rapid development. 


## Junior Software Engineer, 7/12 to 6/13 – Artezio, Vitebsk
Assisted in the development of Internet applications for a big event aggregation service.  Development some internal projects.

Achievement Highlights:
Design and development some critical parts of service.
Refactoring old and slow parts of application. 
Cover application by functional and unit tests
Integrated internal project for book ordering.



### Education

Polatsk State University  –  Belarus, Polatsk
Bachelor of Electronics Engineering Technology, 2009-2014
